name: Paisible après-midi au fil des toiles
name_original: Paisible après-midi au fil des toiles
description:
Paisible après-midi au fil des toiles (peaceful afternoon with the paintings) is a relaxing puzzle game.

Everything is made with one shape, a rectangle, and you will create selection squares to change their colors and match the painting.

This game was done for the GMTK jam 2019

Credits:

A game by Leo Lefebvre and Sacha Chouery.

Music and sounds by Iida Halttunen.

Special thanks to Flo and ClaraGaming for their artistic advice and playtests.

All the painting we used belong the the public domain. They were made by fantastic artists, and you should definitely check their oeuvre.
